metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0452 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In exif_entry_get_value of exif-entry.c, there is a possible out of boundswrite due to an integer overflow. This could lead to remote code executionif a third party app used this library to process remote image data with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-8.1 Android-9 Android-10Android-11 Android-8.0Android ID: A-159625731

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-0452` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-2ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-2ubuntu0.6').
